Clarence Mitchell , who was the director of the Government's media monitoring unit for two years( 2005-2007) will take a back room role, monitoring the progress of the Tories' campaign in the media. Mike Pence said this was his first town hall since the Tucson, Ariz., shootings and he always consults with local law enforcement on security at such events. To me the focus is and should remain on public safety. We volunteer for these jobs, but just because someone comes to a town hall meeting, they should never have to be concerned that there's not a reasonable amount of security, he said. He said town hall meetings are`` very routine'' for him and said he was grateful that everyone came out Monday in the wake of the Tucson shootings.___

STB) is on his way out. In a memo to Microsoft employees, CEO Steve Ballmer made it clear that Muglia's departure signals a shift in the direction the company intends to pursue. This is simply recognition that all businesses go through cycles and need new and different talent to manage through those cycles, Steve Ballmer wrote in his email to the troops.
